string.text: Insufficient materials
Necessary materials
Bullet speed increase
The Night Star artifact has a gravitational field that repels various objects. If the bottom of the barrel is rubbed with such an artifact, its particles will slightly speed up the speed of bullets.

Stalkers have learned to solder this alloy to a moving mechanism. A Gravi reduces the mass of the bullet during the start, while a Night Star accelerates it; as a result, the speed of the bullet increases significantly.
By soldering elements of the Night Star artifact to the mobile mechanism, the initial speed of fired rounds is increased.
Dispersion reduction

Installed in the butt of the rifle, the gravitational field of the Night Star is very powerful, and offers a repulsive effect and a significant counterweight when combined with a Flash, thus reducing recoil.
Higher accuracy can be achieved by using the force of gravitational artifacts.
Sealing the gun barrel with welded particles of a Jellyfish artifact helps to improve the accuracy of the flight of bullets to an extent.
Stability increase
These artifacts can balance the properties of each other and are installed in the weapon for improved stabilization.
An alloy made with the Jellyfish and Wrenched artifacts will help stabilize the weapon due to their properties.
Rate of fire increase
Stalkers have learned to solder fragments of the Night Star artifact in the bolt mechanism, which allows to increase the rate of fire of weapons.

This alloy made of the artifacts Jellyfish and Slug was not chosen by chance. Should increase the fire rate using the gravity of artifacts and not to overdo it with the emitted field. Through trial and error by stalkers, this recipe of influence on the firing mechanism was built, which only slightly increases its wear.
Elements of the Medusa artifact allow to slightly increase the speed of the mobile mechanism, and a Fireball, more precisely its core - reduce the associated overheating.
Elements of the Night Star artifact allow to slightly increase the speed of the mobile mechanism, and a Flame, more precisely its core - reduce the associated overheating.
Recoil reduction
A Wrenched together with a Jellyfish emit a weak gravitational field, which allows, when properly applied, to stabilize the recoil of the weapon.
Due to its gravitational nature and properties, the Jellyfish artifact is used to stabilize the weapon and reduce its recoil.
It is difficult to stabilize and reduce the kickback of a shotgun, so local craftsmen came up with the idea of using small pieces of the Night Star artifact to solve this problem.
To stabilize the machine guns, stalkers usually use the properties of the artifacts Night Star together with a Gravi.
Reliability increase
As it turned out, the gaseous substances released by artifacts positively affect the characteristics of the metal, increasing its strength.
Weight reduction
Due to the properties of artifacts, it's possible to lighten the weapon's weight.
Installation of the artifact particle of a Stone Blood

Few people know, but the dry mass allocated by an artifact which absorbs temporary chemical effects has the property of corroding any dirt that somehow finds itself in the receiver, which relieves the wearer of exhausting procedures for cleaning weapons, needing instead only to shake it out sometimes.
Coating of the recoil mechanism
Crushed particles of the Spring artifact allow you to synchronize the trajectory of the bullet with the aiming line.
Alloy with artifacts Jellyfish and Battery

Stalkers realized that when the Jellyfish and Battery artifacts come in contact, the latter changes the properties of the gravitational field of the first. Thus, installing particles of these artifacts close to each other makes it possible to stabilize the weapon during fire.
Symbiosis of the artifacts Night Star and Flash

As in the case of the Battery, stalkers noticed the influence of the Flash artifact on the Night Star, by "spurring" its properties with small discharges. Correct placement of such fragments allows to significantly stabilize the weapon, making it more convenient to operate.
Gas chamber coating
Coating the gas chamber of the weapon with particles of the Night Star artifact significantly increases the bullet's initial velocity.
Reinforcement of the gas piston

Small particles of the artifact Bubble create a counter-mass to the gate mechanism during gas release and thereby compensates for the movement of the latter - this positively affects the accuracy of the weapons during battle.
Installation of a particle of the Gravi artifact
Due to the artifact's properties, it reduces the mass of the weapon itself.
Alloy composed by the artifacts Soul and Crystal
Crystal very unexpectedly affects the artifact Soul, absorbing some of its energy and modifying it, which allows to significantly stabilize the weapon.
